item.description: Sitting on the porch overlooking the ocean in Martha's Vineyard.  Just finished helping my friend Eva Rawposa run a raw food training over the past 4 days.  Now I am looking forward to the monthly meetup!  As always the first Friday of the month June 1.  Bring an organic raw vegan dish enough for 6-8 people.  If you are new to raw and not sure what to bring....a salad (fruit or veggie) is always good.  Looking forward to seeing everyone!

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: Potluck!!! Friday June1 7pm
